Choosing a Program

With so many options, it can feel overwhelming to pick the right destination or program. The Education Abroad Office team is here to support youâ€”reach out to schedule a conversation about your goals, major, interests, and the application process.

What You Need to Know

Courses included in this tool have been reviewed by faculty for equivalent Pacific course content. You are responsible for working with your academic advisor to ensure selected courses satisfy your degree or major requirements.

If you're using a course for your major, minor, or GE requirement, youâ€™ll need it pre-approved{" "} by your academic advisor. Use the{" "} Course Approval Request (CAR) form {" "} to make it official.

Courses are regularly reevaluated by Pacificâ€™s faculty, and new options are frequently added to the database. Please note that credit hours and equivalencies are subject to change. If no credit is listed, submit a detailed syllabus that includes the native credit amount.

For questions regarding the course evaluation process, please contact the{" "} international credentials evaluation team .
